did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: William Arthur Rawlins papers, 1930-1972.
did.physdesc: Correspondence, reports, data books, radio talks, handbooks, course material, papers.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract:
Papers include general correspondence, and correspondence and reports from Rawlins' work with the Food and Agricultural Organization's Mission to Poland and with the Ford Foundation in
India.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Entomologist; professor of entomology, Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p:
Papers include general correspondence (1930-1972), and correspondence and general reports from Rawlins' work with the Food and Agricultural Organization's Mission to Poland (1947, 1951-1952), and with the Ford Foundation in India (1967-1970); reports, the majority on potato disease,
lettuce yellows, aster yellows and carrot rust fly control; data books recording the progress of various potato experiments (1937-1958); county agents' school reports; and miscellaneous radio talks, senate testimony, handbooks, and course material.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations. Mission to Poland.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: William Arthur Rawlins papers, #21-23-1775. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
